item.title: use devtools
item.description: Although a blog post is not a R package the devtools package provides some useful tools. But who knows maybe a package will sprout from a post. plain devtools Provides some functions to create bundled data. I like to use devtools::load_all() to load up all R functions from the R subdirectory.
